summary: HAVE LESS 15,000 MILES ON THE CAR, MOSTLY USED TO DRIVE TO WORK ONLY ABOUT 2 MILES EACH AWAY. HAVE A PROBLEM WITH GETTING THE AIR CONDITIONER TO TURN ON AND WHEN USED ALOT. SEEMS TO BE A PROBLEM WITH THE AIR CONDITIONER CLUTCH. ALSO JUST HAVING PROBLEMS WITH FAN CONTROL AS THE FAN DOES NOT WORK IN POSITION 1 OR 2. WILL CHECK IF RESISTOR FOR FAN CONTROL NEEDS TO BE REPLACED. CAR JUST WENT OUT OF MANUFACTOR WARRANTY AS OF JAN.
